The '[[Seventh-day Adventist Church]]' runs a large educational system
throughout the world. As of 2008, 1678 [http://www.advent-
ist.org/world_church/facts_and_figures/index.html.en Seventh-day Adventist
Statistics]. Office of Statistics & Archives. Retrieved 2009-08-05
'[[secondary school]]s' are affiliated with the Church. Some schools offer both
elementary and secondary education.
categories: Secondary schools affiliated with the Seventh-day Adventist Church|
